courseName: Insurance and Sustainable Risk Management - MSc
description: Insurance and Sustainable Risk Management is leading the way in shaping the future of the insurance industry. The Masters in Insurance and Sustainable Risk Management from GCU London gives students the skills that insurance professionals of the future will need.The insurance industry is constantly changing. With advances in technology, an evolving risk landscape and a growing need for new insurance solutions in emerging markets, future insurance graduates will be required to have different skill sets to be able to respond to these challenges.
duration: 12-16 months full-time; 2-3 years part-time and distance learning
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
